title: Pentagon takes heat for evacuating only 'a couple hundred' Americans out of 6K total people from Kabul
content:
1. Pentagon takes heat for evacuating only 'a couple hundred' Americans out of 6K total people from Kabul  Fox News
  2. U.S. resumes flights out of Afghanistan after hours-long pause, and announces countries that will aid in evacuation efforts  CBS News
  3. Thousands Gather At Kabul Airport As Pace Of Evacuation Flights Slows  MSNBC
  4. State Department refuses to specify number of evacuees expected to flee Kabul by Aug 31 deadline  Fox News
  5. Baby is handed to US troops at Kabul airport  The National News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Pentagon takes heat for evacuating only 'a couple hundred' Americans out of 6K total people from Kabul  Fox News
U.S. resumes flights out of Afghanistan after hours-long pause, and announces countries that will aid in evacuation efforts  CBS News
Thousands Gather At Kabul Airport As Pace Of Evacuation Flights Slows  MSNBC
State Department refuses to specify number of evacuees expected to flee Kabul by Aug 31 deadline  Fox News
Baby is handed to US troops at Kabul airport  The National News

localize.title: 米国防総省、カブールからの避難者数6,000人のうち、アメリカ人はわずか数百人にとどまったことが話題に
五角大楼因从喀布尔疏散6千人中只有 "几百名 "美国人而受到批评
五角大樓因從喀布爾疏散6千人中只有 "幾百名 "美國人而受到批評
